DOC.brief_title: Supplemental Oxygen Catheterized Coronary Emergency Reperfusion
DOC.detailed_description: Almost patient ST elevation myocardial infarction ( STEMI ) Sweden undergo acute balloon angioplasty ( PCI ) open occlude coronary artery , thereby reduce abolish myocardial infarction . Standard treatment case 10-15 l supplemental oxygen reduce myocardial ischemia infarct size . It , however , unknown whether supplemental O2 beneficial detrimental patient STEMI undergo PCI . This study aim evaluate effect treatment supplemental O2 acute PCI STEMI . The study multicenter single blind parallel group randomize trial . One hundred normoxic STEMI ambulance patient accept primary PCI randomize ambulance either standard O2 treatment ( 10 l/min ) supplemental O2 , give end acute PCI . All patient undergo cardiac MRI day 4-6 determine area risk , infarct size myocardial salvage index . Fifty patient undergo extend echocardiography hospital stay ass infarct size wall motion score index . All patient follow 6 month . At 6 month , perceive health ( EQ-5D ) NT-proBNP record patient , additional echocardiography perform subgroup 50 patient . The primary endpoint myocardial salvage index . Secondary endpoint include pain difference inclusion time start PCI wall motion score index echocardiography .
